compose.intro: If no recipient filter is set and 'To' is left empty, the 'Text' gets sent to all customers.

error.empty: No text given. Cannot send an empty message.

countryIds.label: Countries
countryIds.desc: If set, message sending is limited to customers from the selected countries.

groupIds.label: Customer Groups
groupIds.desc: If set, the message gets sent to all customers from the selected group(s). Uses 'to' as fallback.

limit.label: Customer Limit
limit.desc: Max amount of customers per batch.

salesChannelIds.label: Sales Channels
salesChannelIds.desc: If set, the message gets sent to all customers from the selected sales channel(s).

languageIds.label: Languages
languageIds.desc: If set, the message gets sent to all customers with the selected language(s).

error.empty: No recipient(s) found. Cannot send message without.

performance_tracking.label: Performance Tracking
performance_tracking.desc: Enable performance tracking for found URLs?

foreign_id.label: Foreign ID
foreign_id.desc: Custom ID included in DLR callbacks etc. Max. 64 chars; allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, .-_@

ttl.label: TTL
ttl.desc: Set a custom time to live.

activeCustomers.label: Only active customers
activeCustomers.desc: This setting decides whether to send messages only to active customers or not.

guestCustomers.label: Message guest customers
guestCustomers.desc: This setting decides whether to send messages only to guest customers or not.

udh.label: UDH
udh.desc: Set a custom user data header.

delay.label: Delay
delay.desc: Date/Timestamp for delayed dispatch. Accepts an UNIX timestamp or a date of format yyyy-mm-dd hh:ii eg. 1141511104 or 2016-03-04 23:25:04.
